item.title: Clicking Items need help with a better method
item.dc:creator: @jake.bellotti jake.bellotti
item.description:
@jake.bellotti wrote:

Okay i know how to get things to happen when i click on an item, but I want to add a better system to this code:

[code]if(c.casketP ==1) {
c.getItems().addItems(995, 100);
c.sendMessage(“You open the casket and get a reward.”);
c.casketP = += 1;

if(c.casketP ==2) {
c.getItems().addItems(995, 500);
c.sendMessage(“You open the casket and get a reward.”);
c.casketP = += 1;
}[/code]

I don’t like the first method, and was hoping for something better like:

case 1: c.getItems().addItem(995, 100); c.sendMessage("You open the casket and get a reward"); c.casketP +=1; break; case 2: c.getItems().addItem(995, 500); c.sendMessage("You open the casket and get a reward"); c.casketP +=1; break;

Or even something better.

Can anybody help me, with either tips, a tutorial on how to do so or really, anything. Cheers.
